ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (STANDARDS 210.1 AND 210.2) by requiring, as of April 1, 2007, that school buses and certain other buses be equipped with tether anchorages and lower universal anchorages for the installation of child restraints.
